verses.verse: Let <WG3306> love <WG5360> of the brethren continue <WG3306>.
<WG1950> Forget <WG1950> not <WG3361> to show love unto strangers <WG5381>: for <WG1063> thereby3778, 1223 some <WG5100> have entertained <WG3579> angels <WG32> unawares <WG2990>.

Remember <WG3403> them that are in bonds <WG1198>, as <WG5613> bound with them <WG4887>; them that are ill-treated <WG2558>, as <WG5613> being <WG5607> yourselves <WG846> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> the body <WG4983>.

Let marriage <WG1062> be had in <WG1722> honor <WG5093> among all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> let the bed <WG2845> be undefiled <WG283>: for <WG1161> fornicators <WG4205> and <WG2532> adulterers <WG3432> God <WG2316> will judge <WG2919>.

Be ye <WG5158> free from the love <WG866> of money <WG714>; content with such things as ye have <WG3918>: for <WG1063> himself <WG846> hath said <WG2046>, I will <WG447> in no <WG3756> wise <WG3361> fail <WG447> thee <WG4571>, neither will I in any <WG3756> wise <WG3361> forsake <WG1459> thee <WG4571>.

So that <WG5620> with <WG3004> good courage <WG2292> we <WG2248> say <WG3004>, The Lord <WG2962> is my <WG1698> helper <WG998>; <WG2532> I will <WG5399> not <WG3756> fear <WG5399>: What <WG5101> shall man <WG444> do <WG4160> unto me <WG3427>?

Remember <WG3421> them that had the rule over <WG2233> you <WG5216>, men <WG3748> that spake <WG2980> unto you <WG5213> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>; and considering <WG333> the issue <WG1545> of their <WG3739> life <WG391>, imitate <WG3401> their faith <WG4102>.
Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> is the same <WG846> yesterday <WG5504> and <WG2532> to-day <WG4594>, yea and <WG2532> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

Be <WG4064> not <WG3361> carried away <WG4064> by divers <WG4164> and <WG2532> strange <WG3581> teachings <WG1322>: for <WG1063> it is good <WG2570> that <WG2570> the heart <WG2588> be established <WG950> by grace <WG5485>; not <WG3756> by meats <WG1033>, wherein3739, 1722 they that occupied <WG4043> themselves were <WG5623> not <WG3756> profited <WG5623>.
We have <WG2192> an altar <WG2379>, whereof3739, 1537 they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> right <WG1849> to eat <WG5315> that serve <WG3000> the tabernacle <WG4633>.

For <WG1063> the bodies <WG4983> of <WG2226> those <WG5130> beasts <WG2226> whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> is brought <WG1533> into <WG1519> the holy place <WG39> by <WG1223> the high priest <WG749> as an offering for <WG4012> sin <WG266>, are burned <WG2618> without <WG1854> the camp <WG3925>.

Wherefore <WG1352> Jesus <WG2424> also <WG2532>, that <WG2443> he might sanctify <WG37> the people <WG2992> through <WG1223> his own <WG2398> blood <WG129>, suffered <WG3958> without <WG1854> the gate <WG4439>.
Let us therefore <WG5106> go forth <WG1831> unto <WG4314> him <WG846> without <WG1854> the camp <WG3925>, bearing <WG5342> his <WG846> reproach <WG3680>.
For <WG1063> we <WG2192> have not <WG3756> here <WG5602> an abiding <WG3306> city <WG4172>, but <WG235> we seek <WG1934> after the city which is to come <WG3195>.

Through <WG1223> him <WG846> then <WG3767> let us offer <WG399> up a sacrifice <WG2378> of praise <WG133> to God <WG2316> continually <WG1275>, that <WG5124> is <WG2076>, the fruit <WG2590> of <WG5491> lips <WG5491> which make confession <WG3670> to <WG3686> his <WG846> name <WG3686>.
But <WG1161> to do good <WG2140> and <WG2532> to communicate <WG2842> forget <WG1950> not <WG3361>: for <WG1063> with such <WG5108> sacrifices <WG2378> God <WG2316> is well pleased <WG2100>.

Obey <WG3982> them that have the rule over <WG2233> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> submit <WG5226> to them <WG1063>: for they <WG846> watch <WG69> in behalf <WG5228> of your <WG5216> souls <WG5590>, as <WG5613> they that shall give <WG591> account <WG3056>; that <WG2443> they may do <WG4160> this <WG5124> with <WG3326> joy <WG5479>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> with grief <WG4727>: for <WG1063> this <WG5124> were unprofitable <WG255> for you <WG5213>.

Pray <WG4336> for <WG4012> us <WG2257>: for <WG1063> we are persuaded <WG3982> that <WG3754> we have <WG2192> a good <WG2570> conscience <WG4893>, desiring <WG2309> to live <WG390> honorably <WG2573> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956>.
And <WG1161> I exhort <WG3870> you the more exceedingly <WG4056> to do <WG4160> this <WG5124>, that <WG2443> I may be restored <WG600> to you <WG5213> the sooner <WG5032>.

Now <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515>, who brought again <WG321> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> the great <WG3173> shepherd <WG4166> of the sheep <WG4263> with the <WG1242> blood <WG129> of an eternal <WG166> covenant <WG1242>, even our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>,

make <WG2675> you <WG5209> perfect <WG2675> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> good <WG18> thing <WG2041> to <WG1519> do <WG4160> his <WG846> will <WG2307>, working <WG4160> in <WG1722> us <WG5213> that which is well-pleasing <WG2101> in <WG1799> his <WG846> sight <WG1799>, through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>; to whom <WG3739> be the glory <WG1391> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.

But <WG1161> I exhort <WG3870> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, bear <WG430> with the word <WG3056> of exhortation <WG2532>, for <WG1063> I have written <WG1989> unto you <WG5213> in <WG1223> few words <WG1024>.

Know ye <WG1097> that our brother <WG80> Timothy <WG5095> hath been set at liberty <WG630>; with <WG3326> whom <WG3739>, if <WG1437> he come <WG2064> shortly <WG5032>, I will see <WG3700> you <WG5209>.
Salute <WG782> all <WG3956> them that have the rule over <WG2233> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40>. They <WG782> of <WG575> Italy <WG2482> salute <WG782> you <WG5209>.
Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956>. Amen <WG281>.
